description: Childhood and teenage basics — mostly t-shirts, jeans, hoodies, sneakers, and schoolwear essentials.
Early adulthood wardrobe — workwear, fast fashion, occasional formalwear, seasonal shoes, and accessories like bags and belts.
Midlife accumulation — trend-driven purchases, duplicates of similar items, gifts, and lifestyle-specific garments (sportswear, travel gear).
Peak volume — high rotation of clothing, formalwear for events, outerwear layers, multiple pairs of shoes and branded items.
